select distinct m.id, m.menu_name, m.parent_id, m.order_num, m.path, m.component, m.menu_type, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms,'')AS perms, m.icon, m.create_time from sys_user_role sur left join sys_role_menu rm on rm.role_id = sur.role_id left join menu m on rm.menu_id = m.id where sur.user_id = #{userId} and m.`menu_type` IN ('C','M') and m.`status` = 0 and m.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id,m.order_num
